meanings.definition: The study or recording of earthquakes.
meanings.sent1: Scientists use seismographies to learn more about earthquakes.
meanings.sent2: The seismographies showed a spike in seismic activity last night.
meanings.sent3: The seismographies were so detailed, they even captured the tiniest tremors.
meanings.sent4: Her seismographies were like a map of the earth's hidden movements.
meanings.sent5: The seismographies painted a vivid picture of the earthquake's impact.

meanings.definition: A written record of seismic activity.
meanings.sent1: The seismographies provided a detailed account of the earthquake.
meanings.sent2: I found an old seismography in the library archives.
meanings.sent3: The seismographies were so messy, it looked like a scribble of earthquakes.
meanings.sent4: His seismographies were as clear as day, showing every tremor.
meanings.sent5: The seismographies were like a storybook of the earth's movements.
